Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Horror/Supernatural
Status: New Series
Network: ITV ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 26, 2013
Episode Order: 5

Lightfields is a supernatural drama series set on a remote farm on the Suffolk coast in which three families who each live in Lightfields farmhouse at different time periods. They are linked by a spine chilling presence which is the ghost of a teenage girl who died in mysterious and tragic way.
